Name: Sand King
Bio: The sands of the Scintillant Waste are alive and sentient--the whole vast desert speaks to itself, thinking thoughts only such a vastness can conceive. But when it needs to find a form to communicate with those of more limited scope, it frees a fragment of itself, and fills a carapace of magic armor formed by the cunning Djinn of Qaldin. This essential identity calls itself Crixalis, meaning 'Soul of the Sand,' but others know it as Sand King. Sand King takes the form of a huge arachnid, inspired by the Scintillant Waste's small but ubiquitous denizens; and this is a true outward expression of his ferocious nature. Guardian, warrior, ambassador--Sand King is all of these things, inseparable from the endless desert that gave him life.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc:
Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Abilities.attribute:
STUN DURATION: 2.17
RANGE: 350 / 450 / 550 / 650
SCEPTER RANGE: 700 / 900 / 1100 / 1300
Abilities.lore: Crixalis often lies in wait, burrowing under the surface to ambush his adversaries.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Channeled
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.
Abilities.notes: Sand Storm can be used to dodge projectiles.
Abilities.lore: Some say Crixalis is a mirage; his carapace appearing then vanishing between the whirling sands of the Scintillant Waste.

Abilities.desc: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals less damage if its timer expires.
Abilities.notes:
Units afflicted with the debuff will explode even if Sand King did not deliver the killing blow.
The buff is not placed on allied units.
Abilities.attribute:
EXPLODE RADIUS: 400
EXPLODE DEATH DAMAGE: 90 / 130 / 170 / 220
EXPLODE TIMER DAMAGE: 20 / 50 / 80 / 110
EXPLODE TIMER: 6
MOVE SLOW: 30%
SLOW DURATION: 3
Abilities.lore: An injection from Crixalis makes one brittle and as dry as the arid wastes, subject to implosive demise.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Channeled
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.
Abilities.notes:
The pulses are centered on Sand King, not where he first casted the spell.
The pulses have gradually inreasing radius: 275 / 325 / 375 / 425 / 475 / 525 / 575 / 650 / 675 / 700.
Abilities.attribute:
DAMAGE PER PULSE: 110 / 110 / 110
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30% / 30% / 30%
ATTACK SLOW: 30
SLOW DURATION: 3
Abilities.lore: Many an explorer was lost to the quicksands of the Scintillant Waste.
